feed.title: Paperless-AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

You can now download the Chrome extension zip from the repository to start chatting with your documents right out of paperless-ngx itself. The official extension in chrome store is currently under review for approval.

  • Added Chrome Exstension requirements.
  • add by @clusterzx in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/19
  • Merge pull request #19 from clusterzx/main by @clusterzx in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/164
  • Open chat from Manual by @Nikorag in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/154

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.3.0
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.2.1...v2.3.0

Big News! As many people asked for own API Endpoints I now integrated the "Custom" section. You can now use every OpenAI API conform service you want (like DeepSeek, Openrouter.ai and so on).

Added https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/95 https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/78 https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/34 https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/134 https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/125 https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/122

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.3.1
entry.content:
Fix for https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/194 Fixed Chat function to use with custom model.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.3.0...v2.3.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump undici from 6.21.0 to 6.21.1 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/pull/209

Added: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/235

Added: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/176

Fixed: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/160

Fixed: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/236

Removed: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/238

Fixed: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/220 (there is now a complete new logic, redirecting to settings if a first correct setup was done, instead of back to setup).

Added partially: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/148 (only document_type, custom_fields coming soon)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.3.1...v2.4.0
